Title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend

Description: Ladies Candles: This set of candles includes 16 refreshing fragrances of Jasmine, rose, vanilla, bergamot, fig, lavender, lemon, spring, gardenia, strawberry, rosemary, peppermint,Blue bell wood sage & sea salt peony cherry blossom ,English pear & free.you can enjoy each fragrance

High quality materials: Our candles are made from natural soy wax and aromatherapy essential oils, which guarantee a fresh aroma for a long time, purify the air in your home, and create a comfortable and calm home atmosphere

Sustained burning: Each 2.5 oz single wick candle burns for about 18-20 hours

Recyclable: Candle containers are tin cans, which tin can be used as flowerpot or home decorations after use

Note: When unattended, keep candles out of the reach of children and pets to avoid accidents and fire
